detail_desc: Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with a sheen. Diagonal drawstring at the front with a contrasting colour tie and a gently rounded hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a shirt collar and hem section in woven fabric, concealed press-studs at the top, an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elastication at the back of the waist, a fake fly with a decorative button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Cold shoulder top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top, narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Loose fit with smocking at the hem.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with cutaway coverage at the back.
Dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem. Unlined. Ribbed, ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted jumper in fine-knit Tencel™ lyocell and wool with hole-embroidered sections. Small stand-up collar, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a roll edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Set with a strappy top and pair of shorts in a rib knit. Top in a narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and an overlocked hem. Shorts with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and overlocked hems.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in woven fabric with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems with a frill trim.
Joggers in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped trim around the neckline, sleeve-ends and hem. Partly lined.
Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Paper straw hat with a decorative shell band. Width of brim 8 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Tube top in smocked cotton jersey with a frill trim top and bottom.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Jumper in a soft fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Knee-length skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a detachable tie belt. Pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Small shoulder bag with a concealed magnetic fastener and a flap with a decorative metal ring. Two-part inner compartment and a shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 5.5x14.5x21.5 cm.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.

Straight-cut jacket in a crêpe weave with a satin shawl collar, jetted front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lining made from viscose and recycled polyester.
Sleeveless top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with frills around the armholes and a ribbed neckline.

Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and concealed elastication under the bust for added support. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and medium coverage at the back. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit is partly recycled.

Slightly longer puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Patch front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Hat in soft, rib-knit chenille.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Set with a T-shirt and trousers in printed cotton jersey. Trousers with concealed elastication at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
Shaftless socks in thin cotton jersey with a silicone trim around the heel.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a print motif or pattern. Lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the front and a tie detail at the waist. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back, an open section at the front and an A-line skirt. Unlined.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a viscose blend. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Short, boxy blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Straight-style nightshirt in a soft weave with a collar and V-shaped opening, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details and raw-edge hems.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere.

Jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Diagonal front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and hem, and reflective details. Partly lined in fleece.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a motif on the front, buttons on one shoulder, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Non-wired sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Satin sandals with a heel strap and narrow straps that cross over the foot, some of which are decorated with sparkly stones. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, approx. 7 cm.
Glasses with metal and plastic frames and clear lenses.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and slits in the sides. No buttons.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Ankle-length sports trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Wide legs with sewn-in creases down the front and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a deep V-neck at the back with ties at the hem.
Straight-cut shirt in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.
Scarf in a linen and viscose weave with raw, frayed edges on the short sides.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.

Parka in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard and a wind flap with a hook and loop fastening. Zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, long sleeves with elastication and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.

Imitation suede sandals with straps over the foot, a heel strap and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. The polyester content of the sandals is partly recycled.

Joggers in washed stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets, tapered legs with elastication and gathers in the side seams and zips at the hems.
Fitted, polo-neck jersey top with long sleeves.
Short V-neck top in soft satin with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, shaped cups and a zip at the back. Fully lined.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend a round neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
